about.title: A Legacy of Artistic Excellence
about.p1: Usmar Ismail Hall is Indonesia's first integrated Theater and Performance Venue that combines cinema and concert spaces. The 624 square meter theater has a seating capacity of 422 seats.
about.p2: Designed with exclusive interiors and modern lighting, this Theater supports audience comfort in enjoying every presented event. This multifunctional Theater is also equipped with a hall, multi-purpose rooms, and a spacious lobby to support entertainment, corporate events, seminars, graduations, and streaming.
